attributes.action: Stop giving cash or house or vouchers benefits to anyone.
attributes.background: I want government to stop any type of benefits given to anyone in this country, instead give them job and they should earn money for living like it happens in any other country and if still they can’t they can leave  the country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the provision of certain types of support by the Government, but we're not sure if you want the Government to end all payments and support schemes (including benefits, pensions, grants for individuals and businesses), or only some.

It's also not clear if you want all social housing to be abolished, or only that you don't want the Government to house people for free.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
